titles.title: SelectUSA Authorization Act of 2013
A bill to authorize appropriations for the SelectUSA Initiative, and for other purposes.
SelectUSA Authorization Act of 2013

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
SelectUSA Authorization Act of 2013 - Authorizes appropriations for FY2014-FY2018 for the SelectUSA Initiative (federal assistance aimed at increasing both foreign and domestic investment in U.S. business).
Directs the Secretary of Commerce to report to Congress on Initiative activities during each such fiscal year by the following December 31st.
